name: V_EHI_PAX_PB_ACCT_TX_INV_NUM
description: This view filters out premium billing transaction data that is not appropriate for member level EHI exports when group billing is used.

columns.name: PB_ACT_TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium account transaction.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: Line counter of the premium billing invoice history of the transaction.

columns.name: PB_INVC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the premium billing invoice.

columns.name: INVOICE_AMT
columns.description: Amount of the premium account transaction that appeared on the related premium billing invoice.
